name: Indigenous Lotus
address: Not specified (operates through various venues and online)
description: Founded by Victoria Marie, a Dakota and Sisseton-Wahpeton Oyate member, Indigenous Lotus focuses on yoga and mind-body classes, specializing in trauma and PTSD within Native communities. The business is currently restructuring and has paused clothing sales, podcast, workshops, and events to focus on the founder's health
services: American-Indian-owned Vinyasa yoga in Minnesota consultation
